October 1927.THIS Report gives a summary of the recently published returns of unemployment in the various industries. In Table (A) is shown the course of unemployment during October, while Table (B) gives an analysis of the number of persons on the registers of Employment Exchanges in Great Britain at the 31st October, 1927.(A.) Latest Figures.The latest figure of unemployment published is that for the 14th November, giving the total number on the registers as 1,125,700. This is an increase over the position on the 31st October amounting to 19,643, and a decrease over a year ago of 425,835.ARTHUR STEEL-MAITLAND.Ministry of Labour,November 17, 1927.
